TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RowUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the `RowUpdated` event of a .NET Framework data provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `RowUpdated` event message is typically raised when an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row is completed.

MemberSignature.Value: public RowUpdatedEventArgs (System.Data.DataRow dataRow, System.Data.IDbCommand command, System.Data.StatementType statementType, System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping tableMapping);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Data.DataRow dataRow, class System.Data.IDbCommand command, valuetype System.Data.StatementType statementType, class System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping tableMapping) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand"> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> is called.
The type of SQL statement executed.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand"> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> is called.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand"> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyToRows(class System.Data.DataRow[] array) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow"> to copy into.
Docs.summary: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> in length.
Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyToRows (System.Data.DataRow[] array, int arrayIndex);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyToRows(class System.Data.DataRow[] array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow"> to copy into.
The index in the array to start copying into.
Docs.summary: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> + in length.
Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

Docs.summary: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command%2A> was executed.
Docs.value: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command%2A> was executed.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
Docs.value: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow"> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When batching is enabled, the value of this property will be null. Updated rows can be accessed through one of the `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` methods.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of rows processed in a batch of updated records.
Docs.value: `int` that specifies the number of row processed.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of SQL statement executed.
Docs.value: The type of SQL statement executed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks StatementType can be one of the following values:
- Select
- Insert
- Update
- Delete

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus"> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
Docs.value: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus"> values. The default is `Continue`.
